discourse_list.title: New Article: What is DAI? Here\xe2\x80\x99s an alternative Stablecoin to USDT and USDC!

content.content: I was doing a little reading and saw this little article that seems to be intended for Defi beginners. Nonetheless, I’m glad to see this out there for people to check out. Did someone from Maker put this out there ?    CryptoTicker – 2 Jun 22    What is DAI? Here's an alternative Stablecoin to USDT and USDC! While there has been issues in the stablecoin market, DAI offers massive benefits to traders. Enter the benefits of this project!  Est. reading time: 8 minutes

I didn’t even know of the existence of this media, possibly no one from the DAO published this. But we always keep in mind one thing, the KING is the KING and no matter what the condition is, the crown is always recognized.
Good to see no matter where it came from. I hope things like this help to onboard.

I don’t think this one is sponsored by the Maker protocol. I am a bit concerned by some parts such as “DAI is an algorithmic stablecoin” I mean we spent so much resources sharing how Dai is NOT an algorithmic stablecoin and yet the public still thinks so.

Yes, I noticed that as well. Not great, especially considering the recent history. Today the NYS Attorney General’s Office (a prior employer of mine) put out a press release regarding crypto risks and it mentions stablecoins, of course. Educating the community about how Dai differs from the others is very important for sure.    ag.ny.gov    INVESTOR ALERT: Attorney General James Warns New Yorkers About Cryptocurrency... Click to read more.
